name: Jump Ball Over Ground
description:
Jump Ball Over Ground - a popular worldwide game among children and adults, created for those who like the adventure of bricks.
Compete and have fun together with friends in Jump Ball Over Ground!

Manage the voodoo ball is very simple and does not require special expenses, try it yourself! Bounce the ball from the colorful bricks columns again and again to reach new worldwide records! Collect the crystals so that the columns change their color. And also change the look of your voodoo ball, to a more attractive one! The worldwide in the game can be pumped, find out how you can change it, from the smallest to the whole castle. A game for those who like the style of bricks games and they can hang in them for hours!

How to play Jump Ball Over Ground?
- Click to bounce the Jump Ball Over Ground
- Collect the bricks crystals on your way
- Set records, passing as far as possible

Key features:
- Relieves tension
- Simple and easy operation
- You can change your voodoo ball
- Pump around the world in the game

Put all the new records bounce voodoo ball from the columns. Compete with your friends!
Have fun playing in Jump Ball Over Ground and be the best in the worldwide!
